description: Gets property graph statistics (Gremlin and openCypher). When invoking this operation in a Neptune cluster that has IAM authentication enabled, the IAM user or role making the request must have a policy attached that allows the neptune-db:GetStatisticsStatus IAM action in that cluster.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The HTTP return code of the request. If the request succeeded, the code is 200. See Common error codes for DFE statistics request for a list of common errors.

nested_items.name: autoCompute
nested_items.description: Indicates whether or not automatic statistics generation is enabled.

nested_items.name: active
nested_items.description: Indicates whether or not DFE statistics generation is enabled at all.

nested_items.name: statisticsId
nested_items.description: Reports the ID of the current statistics generation run. A value of -1 indicates that no statistics have been generated.

nested_items.name: date
nested_items.description: The UTC time at which DFE statistics have most recently been generated.

nested_items.name: note
nested_items.description: A note about problems in the case where statistics are invalid.
signatureCount - The total number of signatures across all characteristic sets.
instanceCount - The total number of characteristic-set instances.
predicateCount - The total number of unique predicates.
